ProjectDesc: Apiary and Honey is a mod that adds bees and beekeeping to Minecraft. Unlike other mods which add bees, Apiary and Honey aims to have a more realistic representation of beekeeping than other mods may provide.

Content.FeatureName: Modular Apiary (bees can move between adjacent apiaries) using IBeeHolder Capability
Exclusion Plates (Queen cannot move between adjacent apiaries)
Allow Bees to spawn above the Apiary
Bees can now find a player and sting them when swarming from an Apiary
Uses for honey: Integrations with food mods (OreDictionary)
Uses for honey: Integrations with food mods (Non OreDictionary)
Uses for honeycomb wax: Integrations with other mods (OreDictionary)
Uses for honeycomb wax: Integrations with other mods (Non OreDictionary)
